title: anyone wanna remind me why veigar's entire stun is invisible if the center is inside any wall?
body:
thickness doesn't even matter.. center's in the wall, invisible cage. somewhat infuriating 

######didn't just _lose_ to a veigar, but did just die to one that was standing on a ward. "free kill," i thought. nope. dashed straight into an invisible stun and got blown tf up
